key.name: layouts
key.description: The order of available layouts.

key.name: auto-tile-window-types
key.description: Automatically tile windows of the specified types at creation.

key.name: maximize-single
key.description: Whether to maximize lone windows instead of tiling.

key.name: master-count
key.description: The master tile count.

key.name: split-ratio
key.description: The screen ratio for which windows are split.

key.name: split-ratio-step
key.description: The ratio at which the split ratio is increased or decreased.

key.name: margins
key.description: The margins in pixels to add to the screen's x, y, width and height.

key.name: minimum-gaps
key.description: The minimum amount of pixels to randomly gap windows' x, y, width and height with.

key.name: maximum-gaps
key.description: The maximum amount of pixels to randomly gap windows' x, y, width and height with.

key.name: toggle-tile
key.description: Toggle whether to tile the currently focused window.

key.name: switch-next-layout
key.description: Switch to the next available layout.

key.name: switch-previous-layout
key.description: Switch to the previous available layout.

key.name: focus-next-tile
key.description: Focus the next tile in the tile list.

key.name: focus-previous-tile
key.description: Focus the previous tile in the tile list.

key.name: focus-first-tile
key.description: Focus the first tile in the tile list.

key.name: swap-next-tile
key.description: Swap the currently focused tile with the next tile in the tile list.

key.name: swap-previous-tile
key.description: Swap the currently focused tile with the previous tile in the tile list.

key.name: swap-first-tile
key.description: Swap the currently focused tile with the first tile in the tile list.

key.name: increase-split
key.description: Increase the split ratio by the split ratio step.

key.name: decrease-split
key.description: Decrease the split ratio by the split ratio step.

key.name: increase-master-count
key.description: Increase the master count by 1.

key.name: decrease-master-count
key.description: Decrease the master count by 1.
